thread.title: Lotus supercar arrives at Amari Phuket
thread.title_full: Lotus supercar arrives at Amari Phuket

author: Sirisawan
title: Lotus supercar arrives at Amari Phuket
text:
Lotus supercar arrives at Amari Phuket Lotus supercar arrives at Amari Phuket   11, 2015 | 0 | 
Amari Phuket’s representative, Pierre-Andre Pelletier – Vice President and Area General Manager, South Thailand (right) recently welcomed the TOYCARZ group of Lotus supercar’s owner from Malaysia, led by Chris Poon – Founder of TOYCARZ (second from left) during a visit to Amari Phuket. From left to right: Les Vorosmarthy, Chris Poon, Dato Eric Loo, Steven Goh, Chow Thean Yu, Oh Kah Beng, Pierre-Andre Pelletier
